tha-ap393:2.2: pahaṃsitvāna mānasaṃ → sampahaṃsitva mānasaṃ (bj); sampahaṃsitvā mānasaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:17.1: Osadhañjananāḷī ca → osathaṃ añjanāpica (sya1ed, sya2ed); osadhaṃ jananāliṃ ca (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:26.3: Biḷaṅgaloṇaṃ pahūtañca → bilaṅgaloṇabhūtañca (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); bilaṅgaloṇaṃ bhūtaṃ ca (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:28.4: mahesino → mahesinaṃ (si); mahāyasaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); mahissaraṃ (mr)
tha-ap393:37.2: yācittho tathāgataṃ → ayācito tathāgato (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); ayācittho tathāgataṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:40.3: Yathāsaṇṭhaṃ → yathāsantaṃ (bj); yathā saṇhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); yathāsaṇhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:66.3: sumbhakaṃ → pubbakaṃ (bj); sambhataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); pupphakaṃ (pts-vp-pli1); mattikaṃ (?)
tha-ap393:80.1: yadā chāyaṃ → yadā vāyaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); yadā cāyaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:84.1: Pilindavacchanāmena → pilindivacchanāmena (bj); pilindavaccho nāmena (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:86.4: jhāpayī mama → jhāpayissati (si, pts-vp-pli1, mr); jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap393:89.1: Chatte ca sugate datvā → chatte sugate datvāna (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:118.2: datvā dhammakaruttame → datvā sugate dhammakuttare (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); datvā saṅghe gaṇuttame (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:126.1: Saddhamme gādhaṃ → cetoñāṇañca (bj); saddhamme gāḷhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap393:145.1: Niyāmaṃ sati dhāvanti → niyāmaṃ patidhāvanti (bj); niyamaṃ paṭidhāvantī (si); niyāmaṃ paṭidhāvanti (sya1ed, sya2ed); niyamaṃ paṭidhāvanti (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:150.5: Khalitampi → khalitaṃ maṃ (si, mr); calitaṃ maṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:160.1: Dīpadhāre → dīpaṭṭhāne (bj); dīpadāne (sya1ed, sya2ed); dīpathāle (pts-vp-pli1); dīpaṭṭhāpe (mr)
tha-ap393:163.1: Sugutto → sadā gutto (bj, pts-vp-pli1); tadā gutto (sya1ed, sya2ed); saṃgutto (mr)
tha-ap393:166.1: Malaharaṇiyo → añjananāḷiyo (bj); hatthalīlaṅgake (sya1ed, sya2ed); hatthī līlaṅgake (pts-vp-pli1); hatthalilaṅgate (mr)
tha-ap393:177.2: kaṭṭissā → kaṭṭhissā (bj, pts-vp-pli1); kaṭissā (sya1ed, sya2ed); kuṭṭakā (mr)
tha-ap393:182.3: uppādetvā → upanetvā (bj); upānetvā (pts-vp-pli1) | ñāṇaṃ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṃ upadahitvāna (bj); ñāṇaṃ uppādayitvāna (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:183.3: uppādetvā → upanetvā (bj); upānetvā (pts-vp-pli1) | ñāṇaṃ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṃ upanetvā (bj); ñāṇamupānetvā (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap393:184.3: ñāṇaṃ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṃ upanetvā (bj); tesu ñānaṃ upānetvā (pts-vp-pli1)
